price: 64. Esos obtendrán buenas noticias en esta vida y en la otra. Las promesas de Al-lah son inalterables. Este es el gran triunfo.
arabic: لَهُمُ ٱلۡبُشۡرَىٰ فِي ٱلۡحَيَوٰةِ ٱلدُّنۡيَا وَفِي ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِۚ لَا تَبۡدِيلَ لِكَلِمَٰتِ ٱللَّهِۚ ذَٰلِكَ هُوَ ٱلۡفَوۡزُ ٱلۡعَظِيمُ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: lahumu al-bush'rā fī al-ḥayati al-dun'yā wafī al-ākhirati lā tabdīla likalimāti al-lahi dhālika huwa al-fawzu al-ʿaẓīmu
